verbose_text: Huang et al demonstrated that nitroglycerine (NTG) within a concentration range of 0.1-10 mumol/l notably increased BrdU incorporation into human MSCs in a dose dependent manner, suggesting that NTG enhances the cell growth rate and activity.
evidence: nitroglycerine (NTG) within a concentration range of 0.1-10 mumol/l notably increased BrdU incorporation into human MSCs in a dose-dependent manner, suggesting that NTG enhances the cell growth
